## TrailingNodeExtensionOptions.nodeName property

The node to create at the end of the document.

\*\*Note\*\*: the nodeName will always be added to the ignoredNodes lists to prevent an infinite loop.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
nodeName?: string;
```
